post.body: Flame is singing our bible study in See More him... Got me mad souped... I feel like standing on my chair and singing it
hey... I'm sure you know... how do you make links in tweets without typing the entire url
Well hun bunch your options are... Cinnamon Toast Crunch, waffles bacon & eggs, or Cream of Wheat
Checking out my husbands twitters... mm hmm *very interesting*
Designing my business cards... don't want to be too pink, but that's almost my new favorite color... Argghh! Decisions... Decisions.
Things that make you go hmmm.... What exactly is Flame saying in Go Buck? I don't know, but the beat is SERIOUS!
He restoreth my soul... That's enough right there...
The word is a filter that fitlers out all of the impurities that are taken in from the world... Was feeling a little stressed til I read
Just finished reading Daniel 6... I pray that I can someday be as bold as Daniel
yayyy... I'm going to an etsy craft night in BK!!!!!
Just realizing the addiciton w/ facebook--- http://tinyurl.com/deepbrowndimples
It's official... I'm blogging.. Check out officially plugged-in -http://befavored.wordpress.com
trying to figure out how people have fulltime jobs, fulltime passions, families, facebook pgs, tweets, blogs, etc and still maintain sanity.
my new tweet.(thanks darling) Just had my daily dose of etsy (www.esty.com) and came across new blog that i like www.babble.com
